author: juergen
msg: handle the copy and delete exceptions in the same way, e.g. create a 207 if the delete of a sub-resource failed caused by a lock.

author: remm
msg: - Add a draft release plan for Slide 1.0. Committers can edit and discuss it on
the slide-dev list (non committers can also feel free to join the discussion).
Once the release plan is finalized and a release managed is chosen, committers
will vote to approve (or reject) it.
